Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Shore Drive/82nd
ShortDescription: SB 26 South Shore Express buses are rrtd via South Shore Drive, Exchange, 83rd & over their normal route, due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/82nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore Drive, Exchange, 83rd, then resume over their normal route, due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/82nd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
